EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-10-11-Customer Survey on Azure Stack.Survey Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $25 Amazon Gift Card for 5-Minute Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
As a valued Turbonomic customer, you are always our number one priority in considering future product innovation and capabilities. As such, we would like your input on your intended usage of Azure Stack and VMware Cloud on AWS (VMC).
For completing this 5-minute survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/QYBKW9W]]>, the first 50 respondents will receive a $25 Amazon.com Gift Card. TAKE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/QYBKW9W]]>
Thank you for your patronage and time!
Ben Yemini Sr. Director of Product Management
